message.body: Hey Bruce and Gabi, I'm canceling today! I apologize, but I am fighting a cold or something worse. I have a serious cough and chest congestion (even with cough medicine) and probably not the best for me or to expose you guys. All that being said, I like this time on thurs. does it work for you guys next week?

Ok cool and thanks for understanding you guys. I feel like I'm going to cough up a lung with these coughing fits but fortunately I don't have a fever so hopefully no flu. Bruce, this time on this works for you?
